```{r load_library}
library(swigex)
```

```{r first display}
f1 = Fibo(50)
invisible(f1$display(FALSE))
```

```{r second display}
f2 = Fibo(100, "Test 100")
invisible(f2$display())
```

```{r third_display}
vec = fib(40)
print(vec)
```

```{r fourth_display}
vec = fib(40)
plot(seq(length(vec)), vec)
```
